alert.note: Alert for Clay (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 3:34PM CDT until April 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River at Spencer affecting Clay County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Willow Creek near Crooks affecting Minnehaha County. Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, the right bank overflows, and minor flooding of the Spencer city park and some rural agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday morning and continue falling to 9.6 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Little Sioux River Spencer 10.0 10.0 Tue 2 pm 10.0 9.9 9.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 530 PM CDT.
